title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Introduction to Machine Learning-Based Public Debt Prediction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedure for building a public debt prediction model using the Random Forest algorithm.
Learners can apply data preprocessing and feature engineering techniques for predicting fluctuations in debt-to-GDP ratios.
Learners can write an accuracy evaluation report for economic forecasting through machine learning model training/validation phases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
